channel.title: About on Tamas' blog for sports analytics and more data topics
channel.description: Recent content in About on Tamas' blog for sports analytics and more data topics

item.title: colophon
item.description: The site is built with Hugoâ€”a static site generator made with Go. The website source code is available on GitHub. It uses the cocoa theme. The posts are written in Markdown. The primary font face is Open Sans and the monospace font face is Ubuntu Mono. The social icons are from the Ionicons font set. CSS classes for code syntax highlighting are inserted during compile-time by Hugo using Pygments. If you find errors, please let me know.
